pages.text: If you want to change your gamemode in game, there is a faster way than the $(thing)/gamemode$() command: $(br2)$(thing)F3$() + $(thing)F4$() opens the gamemode switcher menu. $(br2)While holding down $(thing)F3$(), a $(thing)Player$() can cycle between the game modes by pressing $(thing)F4$() and enter the selected gamemode after releasing $(thing)F3$().
You need operator rights to do this.
